articles.title: Covid-19: Third wave 'raging at full force' as Africa reaches record peak in deaths - WHO - News24
articles.description: After a slight dip in cases last week, Covid-19 cases are surging again, says the World Health Organisation. More than half of African countries are experiencing a third wave, while four are in the grip of a fourth one.
articles.content:
• Africa reached a new peak in the number of Covid-19 fatalities this week, said the World Health Organisation.
